      • requestFile

        public static boolean requestFile(HttpEngine engine,
                  java.lang.String url,
                  java.lang.String fileSaveFullPath,
                  EngineHelper.FileRequestObserver observer)
        need the engine instance create by HttpEngine.instance()
        参数:
        engine -
        url -
        fileSaveFullPath - the location of the file be downloaded.
        observer -
        返回:
        task is delivered success or not.
